title: Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Fishing Kayak (Paddle Included), 90508
text:
I bought my kayak over a 2 months ago. Got it a month ago and just got it out.

I Love it, It tracked well and was easy to get in and out of. I am a big guy 6ft 250 and with my gear I am at the max. It handled me just fine no issue.

I did upgrade to the lifetime angler Kayak paddle.

I also upgrade to the Cascade Mountaintech stadium seat and then added a pad. My seat is very comfortable.

I made a mod to make the hatches more usable and had not seen it done before.

I put Pad Eyes under the hatch and riveted it from the top. I added a bungee. see included pictures.

Also, Just saw the Lifetime 11' 6" Yukon Kayak. Now I have kayak envy. Maybe next year.
description: Free 2-day shipping. Buy Lifetime Tamarack Angler 100 Fishing Kayak (Paddle Included), 90508 at Walmart.com
